website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy log rack with a short cover that will last for years.
pros: This more expensive rack is well built
Ideal for seasoning wood with its short cover
The quality makes it worth the price
Holds up to 1/3 cord of wood
cons: The cover can be difficult to fit properly when rack is full

customer_reviews.title: This rack does not measure as a half cord
customer_reviews.text: The rack looks nice and went together rather easily however it is misadvertised as a half cord. The stacking area of the rack measures 91 inches long by 43 inches high. For it to be a half cord, it must measure 96 inches long by 48 inches high. You can get a half cord to fit, but you have to stack it much high than the rack. I thought by paying over $200 that I was actually getting what I paid for. Not true.
customer_reviews.author: Meredeth Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Cover has one drawback
customer_reviews.text: This firewood rack is of great quality and was easy to assemble. The only reason we did not give it a 5-star rating is that the cover would be more effective in keeping out the moisture if it had another grommet in the center. It is a very windy day here today and the center of the cover flies back to expose the wood to the rain. Hope this can be modified for the next customers!
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: Built tough with quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 8 ft rack last year. This summer the rack was seriously bent up during construction at our house - run over by a large fork lift. I took the rack apart and using my large vice bent it back into shape and rebolted back together. NOT ONE WELD FAILED AND THE RACK IS LEVEL AND LOOKS GREAT. Thanks Woodhaven for a high quality USA product. Lastly I priced steel to make a duplicate rack, Woodhavens rack deliver to my house with a cover was less than the steel could be delivered to my house. Thanks again Woodhaven for saving me time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: ROCK SOLID
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Look no further, this is your wood rack. Unless you like buying cheaply made and flimsy, then keep looking. This is the opposite of those things. Guarantee you this thing will last me darn near forever. Assembled in less than 20 min by myself. This is heavy gauge and perfectly designed. Lift up one end and shake the heck out of it - zero rattles. Quality. Thank you, Woodhaven. Buying another 4' one to stick on the deck right by the back door.
customer_reviews.author: Alden Van Solkema

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished putting this together, and I am very impressed with the design and the quality; quality materials, quality fit, and quality finish. Sometimes you come across products that display pride in design and workmanship, and this is one of those products. Update: I've had this unit for over a year, and I am so impressed by the quality that I have bought and assembled a second one. The attention to details on the design are amazing. The cross arms are symmetrical, so they go together either way. There are only two bolts and they only differ by length. They send two wrenches to assemble it, but having a ratcheted socket wrench will make assembly faster.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very strong rack ,very well made , I am not ashemad to put near my front door to make easy to use my fireplace in this brutal cold weather, I really like the cover too , it covers the top and has a very strong elastic that holds it on place , i am very pleased , I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Faridi

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made!
customer_reviews.text: Being in high end construction I get excited when things are made extremely well. The Woodhaven firewood rack is impressive. Everything fits together perfectly square, the powder coating is very well done and it went together very easily and without any hiccups. It’s totally worth the money and when I move to the next house I’ll be buying another so I can store additional wood. Also really love that it is manufactured by a family owned, USA based business. Really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well made, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It came in a single box that was easy to move by myself. Assembly was about 30 minutes with easy to follow directions and well made parts. This thing is sturdy once built and looks good. It holds easily a half cord. I stacked it a bit higher than a half cord with no issues. It even came with a thank you card and a great beverage coozie. I'm very pleased with this purchase and am even thinking about getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Livingthepast

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfection
customer_reviews.text: This is what I expected from a proud American made company! Every part is powder coated, even the bolts and lock nuts. Solid steel construction and the cover itself is very nice and heavy duty. Tie down holes are grometed with double layer of fabric for extra tear resistance and the elastic bands that keep the cover from blowing away are heavy as well. My only recommendation would be to add an additional horizontal support to the top of the end upright supports, otherwise this rack is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: B. Busbee

customer_reviews.title: Bought this a few weeks ago and all appears good, well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few weeks ago and all appears good, well made, in America and it does have stainless steel nuts and bolts. Well finished and I have just loaded it up with 1/2 cord of wood. Looks good and feels stable. Well worth the price. I am updating my review (11-19-2018) had this rack just over a year and it just as sturdy as the day I put it together, it has always had wood in it. The cover is just as good as I was when assembled, how I do not know as it is sitting in the hot Arizona sun. A very good quality US made product. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Made to last
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a half cord of wood. The log rack held a good deal of it. I leveled the rack on six pavers. Not an easy task To level on uneven ground. It pays to have it level when you start stacking the logs up high. It’s sturdy and would not easily tip over. The cover is sturdy and fits nicely over irregular shaped logs. I might buy a second one Next season.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Mine has broken.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2012, for over $200, so I would never have to buy another one. 8 years of service this year. I saw, this Spring, the bottom brace cracked/caved on one side. It has never been moved once placed. No kids played on it. The wood didn’t spill, but it’ll rust out now, in the snow. I would like a replacement. Wouldn’t mind the labor to Unload, dissemble and haul, either.
customer_reviews.author: etf

customer_reviews.title: Just Bought a Second Rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack is well constructed. Simple to put together. Sturdy, though place it on bricks or other firm surface versus directly on grass. Appears to hold a bit less than half-cord, or my firewood provider is overly generous with the volume delivered. Either is fine with me. The rack looks good in the yard and the cover keeps the weather off the top portion, which is good enough for my purposes. The first worked out so well, just bought a second to hold a full cord.
customer_reviews.author: K. Willett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-designed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-designed, nice looking. I'd say it's worth the extra expense compared to other cheaper firewood racks. Relatively straightforward to assemble, but don't rely on the cheapo wrenches they include, which are practically worthless (unless you want to skin your knuckles and have the job take forever). Sure wish I had a socket wrench when I assembled it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Incremental Cost
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like spending this much money on a firewood rack. But it’s high quality and very well built, in USA. I didn’t want to look at a junk rack on my patio, and this is very attractive. It certainly doesn’t look like a cheap, flimsy import. I wasn’t concerned about stability when I loaded it up. The cover is very heavy duty and is fitted. Hopefully the rack and cover will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: high quality - made to last in America
customer_reviews.text: solid construction and well-designed. Not sure if the cover design is as good as it likely will be for snow. Will see this winter in Maine. Would buy more if the price was lower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beefy Merica!
customer_reviews.text: I could tell unpacking this thing that it was American made...sturdy and managably heavy.Took 10 to 12 minutes to assemble with a ratchet set (Not included) I opted to use instead of the 2 wrenches (Included) which would have doubled that time. Not wobbly when assembled. The only drawback as I could see is that if you use 12 inch or less length logs (I have shorter wood for our chimenea) I had to stack longer logs at the ends to pinch the smaller logs into the unit. Overall super happy with the quality and neatly stacked new log pile. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ganser

customer_reviews.title: High quality and right size
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy and didn’t require any rubber mallets or hammers as a few other reviews suggested — just a bit of juggling to line up the bolts. Ordered a 1/2 cord and it fit fine. Fully loaded the rack is stable with no give in the vertical struts. Now I just need to find my bungee cords so I can take the bricks off the cover!
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, so so EASY to assemble
customer_reviews.text: First, Kudos to Amazon, as usual fast delivery, package in great shape. This item was sold as "Used" for a discounted price, I can't even see where it had been unboxed before. Second, to the manufacturer, Woodhaven, GREAT lightweight design, yet when all the square tube is bolted together it becomes a very solid unit. The only wiggle I am getting is because of uneven driveway. Don't figure I will ever have to, but would definitely purchase Woodhaven products again. Assembly tip, save your hands, toss the provided 7/16" wrenches aside and use a socket and boxend wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, as described.
customer_reviews.text: Holds almost a half cord. My husband is very critical about anything in the yard and he is very happy with this purchase. It's sturdy, attractive, and exactly like description. I am 61, female, bad shoulder. I put it together by myself with no problems. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ALFbrewer

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best available for years of use
customer_reviews.text: Solid, precisionly constructed & it truly holds a "Rick" ( 1/2 cord). I bought half & half, 1/2 pinion(pine) which is lighter & starts burning quickly & 1/2 oak, which lasts longer. This product was easy to divide the wood, strong enough when placed on a solid surface, to have complete faith in stability. I had room between my patio & storage shed, to put this on sidewalk. The cover works well to protect the wood from rain or snow, with Velcro sides to remove wood for your fireplace. As you take wood, the cover drops with it to keep the remaining wood protected. A truly great product & well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Connell

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Had other person assist with assembly. Very easy to put together. Seems heavy duty and the powder coating seems thick. Took about 15 minutes to assemble. Very happy with purchase. The cover adjusts to the height of the wood pile easily. Covers only the top third of the pile...wife wants a full length cover though. Going to purchase a shorter rack for backyard use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Seasons the wood well.
customer_reviews.text: This rack is awesome, heavy and built to last. It was easy to build with two people and holds a fair amount of wood. We bought the 3ft model as well when our 1/2 cord delivery didn't fit, probably because our firewood guy gave us much more. The two racks look great in our gazebo and it keeps the wood dry under the cover. We are very happy one year later.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money absolutely!
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered through short-lived, supposedly heavy duty wood racks that just fell apart. This rack is truly heavy duty, keeps the wood neat and the cover is well thought out with holes to slide down as you use the wood, and bungee cord holes if you need it to be more secure. Glad I finally bought it!
customer_reviews.author: marcy

customer_reviews.title: This firewood rack was easy to assemble and was ready to set up in ...
customer_reviews.text: This firewood rack was easy to assemble and was ready to set up in no time. I recommend a solid surface for the legs so it doesn't tip over. The cover is really heavy duty and has elastic straps to hold it to the rack legs. There are also grommets in the cover in case you want to tie a cord to keep it down in strong winds - you need to provide the cord. I purchased the 0.5 cord rack but it did not seem to hold an entire half cord - I think a little of the dimension is lost with the way the legs and base are placed - but I'm not complaining. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: KuliReviewer

customer_reviews.title: VERY good product
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old wood shed with WoodHaven log racks. I don't know why we didn't do it years ago! We have been using them all winter. Assembly was very easy. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: This works perfectly for our needs and I like that it is open at the bottom to promote ...
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for our needs and I like that it is open at the bottom to promote air circulation (have burned moldy wood and it was not pleasant), but the cover does collect some water - maybe that should be as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Moon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Assemble, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase - shipping was quick, package is efficiently designed, easy to assemble and move into place, sturdy, looks good, easily stored a half cord of wood shown here.
customer_reviews.author: KeysPlease

customer_reviews.title: Ready for a cold winter
customer_reviews.text: It took less than 30 minutes to assemble. Very sturdy and well built. I am very impressed. I recommend leveling the area you are going to place it so that it holds up better over time. In 2 hours I had it put together, in place, loaded with wood, and the cover in place. One man job! I do recommend buying the full cover that is sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny - great firewood rack
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! This firewood rack is very sturdy and heavy. It was easy to assemble and impressively well made. When the 1/2 cord of wood arrived it fit perfectly. Very impressed with the quality of this product. Highly recommend this company if you are looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Lenna Pamela Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, little too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but rather expensive, cover only works if logs are smaller pieces, probably would have bought a cheaper rack if I had known that
customer_reviews.author: Eric Strassner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This rack and its cover are solidly constructed and attractive (as racks and covers go). We haven't gone through a full winter with it yet, so can't comment yet on its durability, but so far we are extremely pleased. It was easy to assemble and holds a full half cord.
customer_reviews.author: JMcE

customer_reviews.title: Look Upon Your Woodpile With Affection Again
customer_reviews.text: Thoreau once said, “Every man looks upon his wood pile with a sort of affection.” I never got that feeling until I bought my Woodhaven. I always kept WAY too much wood for my needs, and in a rickety, cinderblock and 2X4 mess that I'd cobbled together. The 8 foot Woodhaven is the perfect size for me, well-crafted, and rock solid. I just wish it were cheaper, but you pay for quality. Thoreau wood love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paintnature

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: we have it at our camper site and it's perfect. keeps the wood dry without allowing animals to move in. nice and big and runs along one side of our camper shed.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Best Firewood Rack on the Planet
customer_reviews.text: The rack is superbly manufactured and packaged. Assembly was a breeze. The quality of the parts and powder coating are exceptional. Would enthusiastically endorse this product if you are looking for a high quality firewood rack. The cover that comes with this rack is also made of sturdy, high quality material, and the stitching is equally impressive. All around high quality American-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Costs more than the Chinese crap out there
customer_reviews.text: This hold wood in my barn, so it is on concrete and I do not use the cover... It is VERY well built and very strong. Costs more than the Chinese crap out there, and its worth every penny. plus you are helping keep american jobs
customer_reviews.author: 2crazy2stop

customer_reviews.title: Love this rack and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write product reviews: I bought the 8 ft rack to store wood outside of my wood burning sauna. I have to say it was very easy to put together and is very sturdy. Initially I didn't think I would use the canvas wood cover but ended up putting it on. It's very heavy and great quality, and look fabulous. Couldn't get my photo to upload - sorry. Although wrenches are included, using a socket wrench will make assembly a total breeze. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: BryanL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Well Made Firewood Rack!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a firm believer in that you get what you pay for and this firewood rack is worth every penny! Very sturdy and very well made. Hat's off to the to Alexander Manufacturing company for this extremely fine AMERICAN made product!!
customer_reviews.author: willik

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These are well constructed with quality materials. They are pretty easy to assemble, 16 total nut and bolt combos to pull it all together. They are made for a single stack of wood so they are only 14" wide. Because I store my firewood in two double stacks, I bought 4 of these. So far, I have loaded up 2 of them. I'm able to store more wood in the same space because these allow me to stack the wood higher than I could without the rack. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my third one of these. It's a deceptively simple design that just works. The cover stays put like nothing else I've tried. The construction is just sturdy enough to handle season after season of wood but is still light enough that one person can move it around (when empty.) I think it's probably too expensive but I can't find anything else that works nearly as well. I've thrown away two other racks and just bought more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Trimboli

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product but if you place it directly against a fence or a house, it will not hold exactly a full 1/2 cord of wood. If the wood is cut perfectly, split perfectly, stacked perfectly, and the rack is free-standing, then it might. Overall, it is definitely a quality rack and I have no major complaints. I may buy another one for added capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Unchained Brain

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier, more durable, made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA of heavier square steel tubing. Not abroad with thinner round tubes. Costs more than the cheap wood racks, worth more. Came with strong hardware (much better than hardware with other racks I’ve bought). And it came with all the hardware, which the cheap versions often don’t. Even the finish, the coating, seems to be heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.... very attractive
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made, very sturdy, and good coating. The cover really impressed me, heavy duty material used and velcro along the edges to allow easy access to wood. Very pleased with this log rack. Assembly was easy, just takes a little time. I recommend using a rubber mallet while assembling, and an extra set of hands at certain steps.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great product (fits half cord of firewood)
customer_reviews.text: Great product, outstanding customer service, highly recommend. We were able to fit just over a half cord of firewood.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Everything Fit Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most products that have to be assembled, this item was perfect. Each bolt hole matched the corresponding hole and went together easy as pie...this manufacturing company should be proud of its craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLINE'S P.

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid rack, great cover.
customer_reviews.text: This log rack is exactly what you want. It is sturdy -- the side posts haven't shifted or leaned an inch. The floating cover keeps the top couple of layers of wood dry and slides down as the pile shrinks. Elastic loops secure it to the four posts should a big wind try to take it (mine has never come off), and velcro flaps make it easy to access that dry layer of wood under the cover. Easy to put together. Three winters old and looks new. Fantastic purchase and well worth the difference in price over cheaper racks.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, superior construction and the proportions are just what we were looking for. This appears made to stand up to decades of use.
customer_reviews.author: Aliea

customer_reviews.title: Great Wood Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rack for firewood! It is very well made and sturdy. This thing ain’t going nowhere in the wind. It holds a full half cord of wood. Would purchase this over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Miceli

customer_reviews.title: Buy the best, its worth the investment!!🌲🌲
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, best firewood storage option available. Sometimes it's worth purchasing an item with a lifetime guarantee. I've waited 4 years to post my review... Buy the best, it's worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.author: dr J

customer_reviews.title: It's super sturdy and really easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking for a while, and was skeptical of the $70 firewood racks. So, after reading positive reviews, I bought this unit. It's super sturdy and really easy to assemble. So, I ordered a half cord of wood and this rack doesn't hold that much. By dimensions of 4 feet by 8 feet by 14 inches, it holds a face cord. I had a lot of leftover wood (maybe my guy gave me extra) but this rack is solid as a rock. (I did places cement pavers so it doesn't sink into the ground)
customer_reviews.author: RobertW

customer_reviews.title: Nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: I added this to hold additional wood at my cabin. Nicely built, strong and stable. A welcome addition
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hegerty

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product is even better than expected. I’m glad not to have purchased an inexpensive product. The rack is easy to assemble, very well-made and sturdy. I would recommend Woodhaven products to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product - holds a full half cord and keeps everything dry. Quality design/materials.
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing firewood log holder, very sturdy and cover stood up to 50+ mph winds. Highly recommended if you can afford it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and well thought out
customer_reviews.text: Once those nuts with the plastic inserts are tight, this thing is never coming apart unless you take it apart. Well designed to be strong and somewhat self leveling. And looks very nice as well as having a clever "floating" design of the cover, which allows it to move up and down with the level of the wood. Also my truck has a 6.5 foot bed and this unit will hold most of a full load, the little bit that won't fit gets burned very quickly anyhow here in New England. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ToneMan50

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the most well built wood racks I have ever seen or owned. I have 2 10ft racks and 1 8ft rack, they look great, super sturdy and keep wood dry and off the ground. I do not write reviews very often but I am very impressed with the quality of these racks, they are well worth the extra money you'll pay for them. This is not your typical 'made in China' piece of garbage, these are top quality and I'd recommend them to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build and super sturdy. The quality of this rack is top-notch and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Simple and sturdy firewood holder, just as advertised. Once we got it assembled and on the patio, we realized we didn't need the 8-foot model and would prefer the 4-foot. The seller was easy to work with to simply exchange the cover (the 8-foot model can be assembled as a 4-foot version) and also adjust the price. Great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Todd G. Schmitter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty straightforward assembly
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straightforward assembly. They give you a little wrench but a drill driver makes quick work of it. I'd give it 5 stars but I just will have to wait and see how the wood ages under it. No complaints. So I've had this a while now. Works great, changed to 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: M. Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, great for keeping wood dry and off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Holds 1/2 cord as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love the short cover keeps just the top rows dry while the rest continues to age
customer_reviews.author: Michael Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of another log rack ASAP and the flimsy looking racks I'd found at the megastores just didnt look like they would hold up to years of use. I took a gamble with this one and was very pleased when I saw how heavy and well made the materials are. Assembly is easy and took my about 30 minutes to assemble by myself. I have a half cord of red oak stacked on it under a shed and it is very sturdy. This rack is highly recommended by this satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Tanguis

customer_reviews.title: Great workmanship made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as ordered. Easy to put together and very sturdy! Holding exactly 1/2 cord wood.
customer_reviews.author: james p cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, rust Resistant
customer_reviews.text: Holds a cord of wood, really sturdy, nice mat finish
customer_reviews.author: Life of love

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. This is my second one
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to assemble. All required parts were included. Instructions were written in complete sentences and easy to understand. Included useful illustrations. This is our second rack and the first one is still in pristine condition. Cover is great and holds up well under outdoor conditions. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gingerky

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product highlights the truism that you get what you pay for. Yes, it's higher priced than some other firewood racks, but the quality of materials is vastly superior. It's heavy-gauge steel, which was apparent when it was delivered--the shipping box was not easy for one person to move. Assembly was simple, taking less than half an hour. It's solid, stable, and will obviously last many years. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: N M

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy - obviously good craftsmanship - would 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Davis

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality and structure
customer_reviews.text: After spending way too long looking at different racks I decided this looked like the highest quality. There’s no mistaking a quality piece of American engineering in this product. It makes all other racks I have seen and had look like junk. If you want top quality, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Caspar Inc Cali

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. The cover is nice because it always stays ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The cover is nice because it always stays right on top of the wood, moving down as the pile gets shorter. My only advice for people is to make sure you have a really solid level ground to put it on. I thought I did and once it was full of stacked wood it leaned forward. Still seems a little pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: John Rizzo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed to keep our wood close to the house and dry.
customer_reviews.text: Holds exactly one face cord of firewood. Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Take note about directions as to what kind of surface this needs to be placed on. The feet are very small and not designed to be placed on grass or dirt. A concrete pad would be best. The cover is very nice. Overall the quality of this product is very high.
customer_reviews.author: In Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality so far, used a ratchet to assemble but included wrenches would have worked also.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wojtanowski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Rugged, easily assembled, holds recommended amount of wood. Well constructed. Appreciated the personally signed note from the owner of the company thanking me for the order.
customer_reviews.author: kevin barrett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast. Easy to put together, seems sturdy enough to hold the wood. Haven't stacked it yet. There is a small hole in each end of the frame which I'm not exactly sure what they are for, there wasn't any left over parts and the instructions didn't mention them. No worries to me! Looking forward to putting this to use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Woodhaven rack that I have purchased. Very sturdy, well built. I had other racks and none of them were as well built as the Woodhaven rack. What I also like about the rack is the cover. It’s made of a very thick fabric and holds up well and does not rip like other racks I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: You need a firewood rack, buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is not only exactly as described and picture, it is a superbly quality product. It's easy to assemble and outstanding durability. Absolutely love it! Considering getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding 1/2 cord firewood rack
customer_reviews.text: What a great piece of workmanship. Spent a little more based on reviews and received this today. Easy assembly. Very sturdy and exactly as advertised. Strongly recommend this firewood rack if you want something well built, made in USA and high in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Howell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rack!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a house-warming gift for daughter and future son-in-law. I have purchased two for myself and love them. I've had one of them for many years and it is still in great shape. I did have to replace the cover eventually but you'd have to do that with any wood rack.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: Woodhaven 8-ft firewood rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack was very easy to put together, I completed it by myself. Very well made, thanks for being made in the U.S.A. When my firewood was delivered the owner of the company stated it was one of the best firewood racks he had ever seen. Holds my 1/2 cord of firewood off the ground and the cover fits perfectly, keeps the rain off. This is a great buy and looks like it will last for a long time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: trdnface

customer_reviews.title: If you have the space, get the 8 foot or larger.  This thing will never wear out!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the most well built wood rack that requires assembly. Intelligently designed, high quality materials, fits together perfectly. I have purchased a second one to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first wood stand 2 years ago (the one on the left in the photo). It's so well made we bought a second one this year. The cover has held up, the construction is high quality, and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: H.R Specter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We just got it and installed it. I'm glad I spent the extra money well made. And thank you to the person who also reviewed this product who told me to put down gravel and bricks.
customer_reviews.author: ReasonableRyan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wood rack!
customer_reviews.text: Woodhaven is the best for the money. Their quality material and machining is consistent and well done. We have 8 of their racks and will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: so easy to assemble. Very sturdy. We're buying two more. The cover is also very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Buy a real cover.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty rack, easy to assemble. The cover leaves a lot to be desired. Keeps the wood as dry as a doily would.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very sturdy and well protected materials
customer_reviews.author: Stanley E. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Easy to build; but I recommend using a ratchet rather than just the wrenches provided.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Deemer

customer_reviews.title: Great wood rack - these stand the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these for for more than 9 years. They look and function like new. The short cover really allows green wood to season (dry) quickly while keeping the soaking rain out of the pile. The new covers (they last about 5-7 years) come with grommets which facilitates tying it down - handy in a windy spot or when the rack is full - I added my own grommets to the original covers. I would order this again - except the ones I have show no signs of wearing out. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bucky Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very sturdy. Cover is well made also.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very sturdy. Cover is well made also.
customer_reviews.author: Oreo

customer_reviews.title: Firewood Rack
customer_reviews.text: Had a local vendor deliver what ended being more that a half a cord. The rack handled it perfectly. It is nicely packaged and very easy to assemble. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, and made in America. Easy to assemble. It looks great. I even received a coozie and thank you note. I’d highly recommend The Woodhaven.
customer_reviews.author: PenName

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, easy to install. Placed it over crushed granite and has kept all my firewood dry!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lyell

customer_reviews.title: Very small cover
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the construction and the ease of assembly. Put the rack together in less than half hour and it is rock solid. The cover however isn't great. The unit description says that the rack can hold up to 24" logs. If you stack your wood and put any larger pieces, even 16-18" pieces, near the top, the cover fits very poorly and only covers 2 rows of wood barely. Nice rack but will need to purchase new cover or use only small log pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Langridge

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This firewood rack is fantastic. It is solid and sturdy and does its job with ease. The cover is a nice addition I really appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Foster

customer_reviews.title: Use a power drill with socket....achieve greatness
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and use 7/16 socket with the wrench to tighten the bolts. Literally saved my life and back. Awesome quality and built perfectly. Made in Merica and they included a card thanking me for the purchase and support...nice touch
customer_reviews.author: MLaw

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, was easy to assemble. Holds 1/2 cord or so. Heavy duty enough for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Keeps the wood dry and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Keeps the wood dry and is sturdy. Only negative is that water collects on top of the canvas sometimes. but not a deal-breaker. I’ve had it for 3 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Erich B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish everything I purchased was built as well as this rack. This is a very sturdy rack that will last a lifetime. This is very easy to assemble. It's engineered so there's really only one way it will go together. It's practically idiot proof. Top notch fasteners fit through every perfectly drilled hole. Best of all, this quality rack is made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: CubFan4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Best I've gotten.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered three different types of firewood racks, this included, and this is the best by far. Sturdiest, easiest to put together. I ordered a cheaper one this past time, but am coming back to this, just because of stability and ease of construction.
customer_reviews.author: Anita - New Hope

customer_reviews.title: The best rack I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the most inexpensive rack out there...but it is totally worth the money. It is constructed really well and the cover is AWESOME. I can see why others have raved about it now that I own one. I bought a rack from Brookstone that isn't nearly as nice as this one. Do yourself a favor and get this rack. It is nice looking enough to place just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stalder

customer_reviews.title: Needed it fast
customer_reviews.text: Most helpful customer service. Fast delivery, arriving in perfect condition. We were extremely impressed with the way it was packaged! Very rare to receive anything so superbly put together. High quality, sturdy, holds what it should! Recommended for anyone wanting to store firewood in an appropriate and organized fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

product_meta.title: Woodhaven The 8 Foot Firewood Log Rack with Cover
feature_bullets: Black, baked on powder coat finish, the best finish and environmentally friendly.
Our own cover design, covers the top 12" of the wood, and automatically adjusts for the amount of wood in the rack.
Arc welded end sections, try finding another rack this strong!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars393 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
